titleStmt.title: The history of Don Fenise a new romance / written in Spanish by Francisco de las-Coveras ; and now Englished by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Quintana, Francisco de, d. 1658.
Person of honour.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Perhaps a translation of Experiencias de Amor y Fortuna.
This item appears at reel 89:9 as Wing C6632 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996), and at reel 289:8 as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) Q220.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
